solution_line_template: Ed found {ed_limpet_shells} shells + {ed_oyster_shells} shells + {ed_conch_shells} shells = <<{ed_limpet_shells}+{ed_oyster_shells}+{ed_conch_shells}={ed_found_total}>>{ed_found_total} shells at the beach.
Jacob found {ed_found_total} shells + {jacob_more_than_ed} shells = <<{ed_found_total}+{jacob_more_than_ed}={jacob_found_total}>>{jacob_found_total} shells at the beach.

In total Ed and Jacob have {initial_shells} shells + {ed_found_total} shells + {jacob_found_total} shells = <<{initial_shells}+{ed_found_total}+{jacob_found_total}={total_shells}>>{total_shells} shells.
